snippet: A painting created by all four Beatles in 1966 is being offered as part of a music memorabilia sale by Philip Weiss Auctions.
abstract: A painting created by all four Beatles in 1966 is being offered as part of a music memorabilia sale by Philip Weiss Auctions.

headline.main: Painting by the Beatles Heads to Auction
